channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Guardium
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Guardium

item.title: CVE-2023-30435|2024-08-02T14:21:44.870Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, and 11.5 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 252291.

item.title: CVE-2023-33852|2024-08-02T15:54:12.596Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 257614.

item.title: CVE-2023-35893|2024-08-02T16:37:39.945Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.6, 11.3, 11.4, and 11.5 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 258824.

item.title: CVE-2023-30437|2024-08-02T14:21:44.814Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, and 11.5 could allow an unauthorized user to enumerate usernames by sending a specially crafted HTTP request. IBM X-Force ID: 252293.

item.title: CVE-2023-30436|2024-08-02T14:21:44.814Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, and 11.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 252292.

item.title: CVE-2023-0041|2024-08-02T04:54:32.576Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.5 could allow a user to take over another user's session due to insufficient session expiration. IBM X-Force ID: 243657.

item.title: CVE-2023-47717|2024-06-04T17:26:34.287Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.

item.title: CVE-2023-47710|2024-06-04T17:26:36.057Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-05-11T13:18:21.646Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.title: CVE-2023-47712|2024-06-04T17:26:41.436Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges on the system due to improper permissions control. IBM X-Force ID: 271527.

item.title: CVE-2023-47709|2024-06-04T17:26:43.588Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 271524.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-07-23T21:00:38.139Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.
